Who am I

My name is Derek and I am a Computer Information Systems graduate pursuing career in Software Engineering.

Derek Roberts

I have worked with C/C++, Python and developer tools such as Git, GDB, Xcode and others as well as posess a familiarity with Django, Rails and Firebase. I have also employed software testing suites, integration and acceptance testing.

Professional, personable, driven and always willing to learn.

Gameboy Zero

Portable Linux game console using a Raspberry Pi Zero and modified automobile backup camera monitor within the shell of a Game Boy. The original control circuitry was kept by wiring directly into a Teensy microcontroller that emulated keyboard inputs.

  • Date: June 2016
  • Tech: Linux, Embedded Systems, Hobby Electronics

Securis iOS App

Multi-user iOS app that quizzed and ranked users on security concepts. Firebase was used as the back-end for both JSON data storage along with user authentication.

  • Date: May 2018
  • Tech: Swift, Firebase, Xcode

Parkr iOS App

Allowed students to connect and trade parking spaces around campus using a Firebase back-end along with the Google Maps API. UI tests were employed using Xcode’s XCTest framework, allowing for a consistent and predictable user experience.

  • Date: May 2018
  • Tech: Swift, Firebase, Google Maps
